text:
Step into the latest bariatric care approaches in this live webinar on Zoom — covering everything from pre-op planning to long-term post-op nutrition management.

🔍 Essential techniques you'll explore:
✔️ Prepare patients nutritionally before surgery & implement liver-shrinking diets
✔️ Manage post-op meal progression & hydration effectively
✔️ Monitor micronutrients and provide evidence-based supplementation
✔️ Address complications like dumping syndrome, hypoglycemia, and weight regain
✔️ Use counseling techniques to improve adherence & support lasting success
✔️ Apply real case examples with practical nutrition monitoring tools

💥 Early Bird Pricing Now Available: Message us “Bariatric” through the WhatsApp link in bio to claim your early bird

#LiveWebinar #BariatricNutrition #ClinicalNutrition #DietitianCourse #CME #NutritionStrategies #CatalystCourses #ESPEN #ASMBS
